    80% complete

customCheckMod-qualityChecks.html:
DC_basisOfRecordBadlyFormed

Description:

basisOfRecordBadlyFormed Check if the specific nature of the data record is within controlled vocabulary

Sample Passing Data:

dwc:basisOfRecord was matched to vocabulary

Sample Failing Data:

dwc:basisOfRecord could not be unambiguously matched to vocabulary

Category of Quality Check:

Record_level Terms

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

basisOfRecord



DC_classUnknown

Description:

classUnknown The full scientific name of the class in which the taxon is classified is within given vocabulary

Sample Passing Data:

Taxonomic rank Class was interpreted correctly

Sample Failing Data:

Taxonomic rank Class value cannot be interpreted

Category of Quality Check:

Taxon

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

class



DC_coordinatePrecisionMismatch

Description:

coordinatePrecisionMismatch Check if decimal values given in decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude does agree witha a decimal representation of the precision of the coordinates (coordinatePrecision)

Sample Passing Data:

The number of decimal places of latitude (dwc:decimalLatitude) and longitude (dwc:decimalLongitude) is in agreement with the supplied coordinate precision (dwc:coordinatePrecision)

Sample Failing Data:

The number of decimal places of latitude (dwc:decimalLatitude) or longitude (dwc:decimalLongitude) is not in agreement with the supplied coordinate precision (dwc:coordinatePrecision)

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

decimalLatitude,decimalLongitude



DC_coordinatesZero

Description:

coordinatesZero Check if decimal values given in decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude are not zero

Sample Passing Data:

Decimal latitude and longitude are not zero (0) degrees

Sample Failing Data:

Decimal latitude and longitude are both zero (0) degrees

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

decimalLatitude,decimalLongitude



DC_countryMismatch

Description:

countryMismatch Check if given country match given country code.

Sample Passing Data:

Country name (dwc:country) and ISO country code (dwc:countryCode) match

Sample Failing Data:

Country name (dwc:country) and ISO country code (dwc:countryCode) do not match

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

country



DC_countryNameUnknown

Description:

countryNameUnknown Check if the name of the country or major administrative unit in which the location occurs is within given vocabulary

Sample Passing Data:

Country name (dwc:country) is in vocabulary

Sample Failing Data:

Country name (dwc:country) not in vocabulary

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

country



DC_dataGeneralised

Description:

dataGeneralised Chech if dataGeneralizations is a NULL column (ie, latitude and longitude were not generalized)

Sample Passing Data:

Latitude and longitude values have not been generalized as indicated by dwc:dataGeneralizations is NULL

Sample Failing Data:

Latitude and longitude values may have been generalized as indicated by dwc:dataGeneralizations is not NULL

Category of Quality Check:

Record_level Terms

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

dataGeneralizations



DC_dateIdentifiedInFuture

Description:

dateIdentifiedInFuture Check if record identification date is not in the future

Sample Passing Data:

Date (dwc:dateIdentified) is not in the future

Sample Failing Data:

Date (dwc:dateIdentified) is in the future

Category of Quality Check:

Identification

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

dateIdentified



DC_dateNull

Description:

dateNull Check if eventDate, year, verbatimEventDate are not NULL

Sample Passing Data:

Date information is present

Sample Failing Data:

No date information

Category of Quality Check:

Event

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

eventDate,year,verbatimEventDate



DC_dayInvalid

Description:

dayInvalid Check if event day is valid (1 <= integer <= 31)

Sample Passing Data:

The value given for event day is between 1 and 31

Sample Failing Data:

The value given for event day is less than 1 or greater than 31

Category of Quality Check:

Event

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

day



DC_depthOutOfRange

Description:

depthOutOfRange Check if depthOutOfRange is not out of range.

Sample Passing Data:

Minimum depth is greater than or equal to zero (0) and maximum depth is less than 11,000 meters

Sample Failing Data:

Minimum depth is less than zero (0) or maximum depth is greater than 11,000 meters

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

minimumDepthInMeters,maximumDepthInMeters



DC_elevationOutOfRange

Description:

elevationOutOfRange Check if elevationOutOfRange is not out of range.

Sample Passing Data:

Minimum elevation in meters is greater or equal to zero and maximum elevation in meters is less than 10,000 meters

Sample Failing Data:

Minimum elevation in meters is less than zero and/or maximum elevation in meters is greater than 10,000

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

minimumElevationinMeters,maximumElevationInMeters



DC_eventDateInFuture

Description:

eventDateInFuture Check if event date is not in the future

Sample Passing Data:

dwc:eventDate is valid

Sample Failing Data:

dwc:eventDate is in the future

Category of Quality Check:

Event

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

eventDate



DC_identifiedDateImprobable

Description:

identifiedDateImprobable Check if identification date is between Linnaeus and current date

Sample Passing Data:

The date of identification (dwc:dateIdentified) is post Linnaeus (1753) to the current date

Sample Failing Data:

The date of identification (dwc:dateIdentified) falls prior to Linnaeus (1753) or after the current date.

Category of Quality Check:

Identification

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

dateIdentified



DC_individualCountInvalid

Description:

individualCountInvalid Check if the number of individuals represented present at the time of the occurrence is and intiger

Sample Passing Data:

The count of individuals is a valid integer

Sample Failing Data:

The count of individuals is not an integer and therefore invalid

Category of Quality Check:

Occurrence

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

individualCount



DC_modifiedInFuture

Description:

modifiedInFuture Check if date on which the resource was changed is not in the future

Sample Passing Data:

dcterms:modified date is valid

Sample Failing Data:

dcterms:modified is in the future

Category of Quality Check:

Record_level Terms

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

modified



DC_monthInvalid

Description:

monthInvalid Check if event month is valid (1 <= integer <= 12)

Sample Passing Data:

The event month is between 1 and 12

Sample Failing Data:

The event month is less than 1 or is greater than 12

Category of Quality Check:

Event

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

month



DC_namePublishedYearInFuture

Description:

namePublishedYearInFuture Check if year in which scientific name was published is not in the future

Sample Passing Data:

dwc:namePublishedInYear is valid

Sample Failing Data:

dwc:namePublishedInYear is in the future

Category of Quality Check:

Taxon

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

namePublishedInYear



DC_occurrenceIdNotGuid

Description:

occurrenceIdNotGuid Check if an identifier for the occurrence is a globally uniquely identifier (currently we use regex pattern solution is implemented)

Sample Passing Data:

occurrenceID is a globally uninique identifier (GUID)

Sample Failing Data:

occurrenceID is an integer, assuring that it is not a globally uninique identifier (GUID)

Category of Quality Check:

Occurrence

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

occurrenceID



DC_precisionRangeMismatch

Description:

precisionRangeMismatch Check if precision range mismatch is between 0 and 1

Sample Passing Data:

The coordinate precision (dwc:coordinatePrecision) is between zero (minimum) and one (maximum)

Sample Failing Data:

The coordinate precision (dwc:coordinatePrecision), as a decimal representation, is outside the range of zero (minimum) and one (maximum)

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

coordinatePrecision



DC_uncertaintyRangeMismatch

Description:

uncertaintyRangeMismatch Check if geopoint uncertainty range mismatch is a positive integer (meters).

Sample Passing Data:

Geopoint uncertainty (dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters) is a whole number and greater than zero (meters)

Sample Failing Data:

Geopoint uncertainty (dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters) should be a whole number and greater than zero (meters)

Category of Quality Check:

Location

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

coordinateUncertaintyInMeters



DC_yearMissing

Description:

yearMissing Check if year information is not missing

Sample Passing Data:

The value for dwc:year is valid

Sample Failing Data:

The value for dwc:year is NULL

Category of Quality Check:

Event

DWC Field Targetted by Check:

year

questionnaireMod-questionnaire.html:
1) Do you worry about taxonomical aspect of the data?


2) What is the lowest taxonomic level you require in your data?


3) Do you worry about spatial aspect of the data?


4) What is the spatial resolution required for your data? (in meteres)


5) Do you worry about precision of coordinates?


6) Do you worry about countries of occurrences?


7) Do you worry about elevation of occurrences?


8) Do you worry about temporal aspect of your data?


9) What is the range of dates of the observations in this data set? In format (YYYY-mm-dd YYYY-mm-dd)

to

10) What temporal resolution are you interested in?


11) Do you worry about dates other than occured date (published date/identified date)?


12) Do you worry about other properties of occurrence? (GBIF issues/publisher/occuranceremark, etc)?
